considerationsDescription: Washing the bottle in the dishwasher may cause damage to the colour coating.
360DegreeViewDescription: Spin the bottle or tap on it to zoom in.
incentiveSubtitleOne: We'll replace it with a new one
incentiveDisclaimerOne: Warranty void if there is any physical damage to the bottle.
incentiveSubtitleTwo: Dislike the bottle? Send it back
incentiveDisclaimerTwo: Personalized bottles cannot be refunded or exchanged.
